entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unnecessary Margin in TitleView #9333
  • Convert all uses of UICommand to UIAction #9332
    .NET 7
  • Button IsEnabled="{Binding IsBttEnabled}" - Not working - but IsVisible works #9331
  • Unable to deploy maui apps to android devices #9329
  • Brand new install of Visual Studio 2022 17.3 with Maui Workload on MAC M1 fails #9328
  • Add IView.EffectiveFlowDirection #9326
    .NET 7
  • FlexLayout render error after update VS 2022 17.3.0 #9325
  • 'Unable to activate windows store app {id}. The activation request failed with error code "The parameter is incorrect"' #9324
  • Convert over additional non appcompat controls to appcompat #9323
    6.0-sr5
  • SVG Icon and Splash Problems #9322
  • MAUI on .NET 7 RC1 not buildable in Visual Studio?! #9321
  • Default value of a Preferences.Get returns a null value in Windows #9306
  • Unable to create android emulator #9304
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.4 Preview 1, Maui projects with only 1 Target do not work #9303
  • In iOS, calling .Clear() on an ObservableCollection bound to a listview causes a nullref #9302
  • PublishSingleFile=true causes maui app to crash at launch #9301
  • Shell, Navigation and Page instantiation #9300

Closed

  • Error boundary message does not display on mobile devices #9175
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Cannot debug .NET MAUI Android project on real Android physical device #9159
  • XamlC error XFC0000 : Cannot resolve type "Application". After Adding reference project. #9305

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IView.EffectiveFlowDirection #9327
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9319
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9318
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.1 to 4.13.2.2 #9317
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Castle.Core from 5.0.0 to 5.1.0 #9316
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9315
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9314
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9313
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 118.0.2.1 to 118.0.2.2 #9312
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9311
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.7 to 6.0.8 #9310
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.DesignTools.Extensibility from 17.2.32505.113 to 17.3.32804.24 #9309
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.8 to 120.0.0.9 #9308
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.2.0 to 17.3.0 #9307
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Fix the TFM order for VS #9297
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 7
  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • [NET7.0][Tizen] Bump up SamsungTizenSdkPackageVersion #9280
    community ✨
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, .NET 7
  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1264.42 to 1.0.1293.44 #9284
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix [Android] CollectionView EmptyView SelectionMode=Single on Android #9215
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
